title: Router: tools env constraints
description: Routes tool-planning through environment detection + capability constraint gate + WAIT_USER selection when blocked.

content.mermaid:
flowchart TD
  A[Goal/PlanContext] --> B[Detect runtime + constraints]
  B --> C[Constrain capabilityRefs]
  C -->|blocked| D[WAIT_USER: select execution environment]
  D --> E[Map env choice -> executionTarget]
  C -->|ok| F[Continue]
  E --> F
  F --> G[Next: prompt gate / execution]
